sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! reducing the cooldown of Combustion by 2 sec. Casting Combustion always hits a Jackpot! at 200% increased effectiveness.
Set: When you hit a Jackpot! your damage is increased by 15% for 7 sec. If you would gain Jackpot! from Combustion the duration is increased by 100%.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Use: Reduce the remaining cooldown of your 3 most recently cast spells by 5 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 963 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 963 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,569 to 10,473 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 317 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

item.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Personal Tabard
description: Visit Personal Tabard Designers in Stormwind, Orgrimmar, or Valdrakken to change your personal tabard design.
